comments.body: [The documentation](https://github.com/gregnb/mui-datatables#column-options) says `setCellProps` returns a `string`. Can you back this with a code snippet from the library? I based my typings primarily on the documentation.
I opened a PR to fix it in the documentation as well. It has been merged 10 hours ago :)
Is it correct that this is no longer an array?

Yes, see this [example](https://github.com/gregnb/mui-datatables/blob/master/examples/column-filters/index.js) for details, also mentioned in the [readme](https://github.com/gregnb/mui-datatables) (see filterOptions in options table for column ). The string array with options moved into an object i called MUIDataTableFilterOptions with new settings `display ` and `logic`. As said: I'm not sure about the exact typing of especially display.
I see em, suggested a better typing for `logic` below. I don't think much more can be done for `display` unless they properly document their typings.
